summary: Implements an asynchronous guardrail that communicates with the Aporia AI moderation service, preparing request payloads, sending them via HTTP, processing the responses, and enforcing moderation and post‑execution safety checks within the LLM proxy workflow.
business_intent: Provide enterprise‑level content safety and compliance by automatically filtering and validating AI model outputs through Aporia, reducing risk of harmful or non‑compliant responses.
